game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and retrieve the ancient artifact from the ruins.
game.description: You've heard rumors that the lost artifact is hidden in a forgotten ruin deep in the jungle. Your quest is to locate it and bring it back to the village elder.
game.reward: 100 gold coins and the respect of the villagers

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the ruins
task.description: Talk to the ancient tree in the heart of the jungle for directions.

task.objective: Decipher the cryptic inscription on the ruins' door
task.description: Solve the riddle to unlock the entrance.
